=== System Distribution November 15, 2007 (8.0.1015) ===

Major Changes:
  * New Module: !StackyHack, illustrating use of Sensors. 
  * Improvements to Coverage and !CodeIssue SDTs ("One Sensor Data Instance Per File").
  * Improvements to SDV and SDB (internal performance stuff)
  * Misc internal improvements to Utilities, !SensorBase, !DailyProjectData, Telemetry.
